title: Audrina Patridge, 34, is 'dating' Dallas actor Josh Henderson, 37... months after finalizing divorce
text:
Her divorce from Corey Bohan was finalized on December 20, 2018.

And Audrina Patridge has moved on with actor Josh Henderson, according to Us Weekly.

The reality star, 34, and the TV star, 37, who have been friends for years, are dating, the website reports.

New couple alert: Audrina Patridge has moved on with actor Josh Henderson, according to Us Weekly

The website reports that the duo have been friends since as least 2009 - when they were first photographed together.

They were last seen together on October 2 while at the Night of the Jack's Friends and Family Night, Us Weekly reported.

However, Josh's rep told the magazine that 'they are friends.'

In July, she told Us Weekly that she was dating someone but declined to reveal his identity.

New love interest? The website reports that the duo have been friends since as least 2009 - when they were first photographed together; pictured September 27

The Hills star said she values a partner who doesn't play any games and 'no B.S.'

Adding: 'I think being a mom, that's a huge thing to factor in. So immediately it's all right, I have a child ad she's my priority, so I have to put everything on the table because then you don't waste time,' she told Us Weekly.

She said: 'But definitely someone that's good at communicating and consistent and a man of their word, and what you see is what you get.'

Audrina has a three-year-old daughter named Kirra Max with 37-year-old ex-husband Corey, a professional BMX rider.

Happier times: Her divorce from Corey Bohan was finalized on December 20, 2018; pictured June 1, 2013 in Las Vegas

Mother daughteR: Audrina has a three-year-old daughter named Kirra with ex husband Corey, a professional BMX rider

They began dating in 2008 and he proposed on November 20, 2015; they tied the knot on November 5, 2016.

Audrina filed for divorce on September 20, 2017 and the divorce was finalized on December 20, 2018.

She had a temporary restraining order against him in July after she accused him of abuse, barring him from coming within 100 yards of her or their daughter's school.

By August, the duo came to a visitation agreement.

She moved on to on-off beau Ryan Cabrera in May 2018 but split in September of that same year; she briefly dated Matt Chase in February but they split two months later.

Josh has been linked to Brittany Snow, Ashlee Simpson, Survivor alum Andrea Boehlke and Kendal Sheppard from The Challenge.

So cute: Kirra had a mermaid themed birthday party on July 1; she turned three on June 24
description: Her divorce from Corey Bohan was finalized on December 20, 2018. And Audrina Patridge has moved on with actor Josh Henderson, according to Us Weekly.
